name: Fun Shooting Watermelon
description:
Do you love 3D shooting games with gun in hand? If yes then this watermelon shooter game is for you. Smash the watermelons with limited bullets of guns. AIM and Shoot in this watermelon shooter 3D app with modern weapons and shotguns.

Features:
- Real shooting at army training camp
- Realistic crushing and smash sound
- Real broken blast with 3D animation
- Aim and smash the fruits
- Arcade and time attack mode
- Addicting FPS gameplay
- Accuracy will be tested in expert levels
- Easy and intuitive controls for action game
